locationDescription: Pebble events can be both local or online. Choose where you want to host your event.
dateAndTimeDescription: Select the day and starting time of the event.
eventTypeDescription: Every pebble event should serve at least one of the sustainable development goals of United Nations. Which goal do you want to help in? Select all that apply.
eventTitleDescription: Choose a title that will give people a clear idea of what the event is about. Feel free to be creative! You can edit this later if you change your mind.
eventDescriptionDescription: Describe the purpose of your event. Who should join and what will you do at the event?
eventImageDescription: We have found that listings with a photo attract more interest.
guidelinesTitle: Almost Done! Just take a minute to review our guidelines.
guidelinesDescription: Pebble is all about helping people with the help of volunteers like you. This means that all events should:
guideline1: Be transparent about the event's intentions
guideline2: Encourage real human interactions in person or online
guideline3: Have the host present in all events
readMore: You can read more about all of this in our
createEventButton: Agree with terms and Create Event!
infoChangeLater: The following information cannot be changed later on:
